attributes.action: Teach Business and and other GCSE Subjects from Year 7 instead of Year 9.
attributes.background: I am 13 and I think that it should be mandatory if all secondary schools in The UK start teaching Business or any other GCSE only subject - ie Finance, Political Science , Law) from the age of 11 so that pupils have the idea of what they are going to do when they are older.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not just exactly which subjects you want to be taught from year 7. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
